My blood Pressures

Age

  • Raw Data
  • Logarithmic Data

My Blood pressure histogram

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginService } from '../login.service'; import { GeneralApiService } from '../general-api.service'; import { Observable, Subscription, first, interval, switchMap } from 'rxjs'; import { UserBloodPressure } from '../model/user-blood-pressure'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hostogram', templateUrl: './histogram.component.html', styleUrls: ['./histogram.component.scss'], }) export class HistogramComponent implements OnInit, { token!: string; isRawDisplay = true; bloodPressureRangeRaw!: number[]; bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic!: number[]; frequencyNumber = [20,40,60,80,100].reverse(); bloodPressure$!: Observable; pollInterval!:Subscription; constructor( private loginService: LoginService, private api: GeneralApiService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.bloodPressureRangeRaw = this.generateRawRange(); this.bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic = this.generateLogarithmicRange(); //this.token = this.loginService.LoginToken; this.token = "iasgosdjaoifgo"; this.bloodPressure$ = this.api.getUserBloodPressure(this.token).pipe(first());//call for the first time this.bloodPressure$ = interval(5000).pipe( switchMap(() => this.api.getUserBloodPressure(this.token).pipe(first()) ) ) } switchPanel(isRaw: boolean){ this.isRawDisplay = isRaw; } generateRawRange():number[]{ let result = []; let start = 80; while(start <= 200){ result.push(start); start += 10; } return result; } generateLogarithmicRange():number[]{ let result = []; let start = 4.0; while(start <= 5.4){ result.push(start); start += 0.2; start = parseFloat(start.toFixed(1)); } return result; } calRawBucketValues(data: any): number[]{ let result = new Array(11); result.fill(0) for(let each of data[0].bloodPressure){ let index = this.calculateRawInterval(each); result[index] += 1; } return result; } calLogBucketValues(data: any): number[]{ let result = new Array(8); result.fill(0) for(let each of data[0].bloodPressure){ let index = this.calculateLogInterval(Math.log(each)); result[index] += 1; } return result; } calculateRawInterval(num: number){ let index = 0; for(let i = 0; i < this.bloodPressureRangeRaw.length - 1;i ++){ if(num >= this.bloodPressureRangeRaw[i] && num < this.bloodPressureRangeRaw[i + 1]){ index = i + 1; } } return index; } calculateLogInterval(num: number){ let index = 0; for(let i = 0; i < this.bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic.length - 1;i ++){ if(num >= this.bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic[i] && num < this.bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic[i + 1]){ index = i + 1; } } return index; } }
